entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, who is feared by Harry Potter. He pays no attention to the headless golden statue's intervention and instead focuses on Dumbledore.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is being threatened by Voldemort. The headless golden statue intervenes to protect him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A powerful wizard who appears behind the golden gates and helps Harry Potter by distracting Voldemort with his magic.

entities.name: avada kedavra
entities.description: The killing curse cast by Voldemort, which is described as a jet of green light.

relationships.description: Voldemort casts the Avada Kedavra spell at Harry Potter, but it is blocked by the headless golden statue.
Voldemort sends a jet of green light at Dumbledore, who turns and reappears behind him to counterattack.
